com.varmateo.yawg.api

Class PageContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.varmateo.yawg.api.PageContext

  • public final class PageContext
extends Object
    Information to be used by a baker when baking a file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PageContext.Builder
      A builder of PageContext instances.
